基本命令

  • $ rake theme:switch name="the-program"
  • $ rake post title="Hello World"
  • $ rake page name="about.md"
  • $ rake page name="pages/about.md" Create a nested page
  • $ rake page name="pages/about" Create a nice url page with index.html
